Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Ore no Sora

name: Jissen Pachi-Slot Hisshouhou! Ore no Sora
summary: A virtual slots game for the PlayStation 2 that simulates the 2006 Rodeo pachi-slot machine Ore no Sora (itself based on the '70s manga of the same name).
